LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.showDebugInfo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Write debugging information into file. In ~/App_Data/ folder.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.IsNoRegisted
LocaleResource.Value: Unregistered version is fully operational. There is only one limitation – only 100 payments.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.IsExpired
LocaleResource.Value: Your license has expired, you should renew the license with a 50% discount.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.SupportMultiCurrency.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: By default plugin uses the primary currency of store, but you can enabled to use the customer's currency of the order.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.AdditionalFee.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter additional fee to charge your customers.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.AdditionalFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to apply a percentage additional fee to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.ShowConfirmPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable 'Confirm' page in nop store after payment on PayPal.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.CreateOrderMode.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose the creating mode for nop order (after or before payment).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.IgnoreOrderItems.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Don't send order items on PayPal. Customer will not see products from the order on PayPal site, he will see only total amount.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.DescriptionTransaction.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Description of the transaction in PayPal store. By default your customer will see this message 'NopCommerce PayPal Standard Pro.'.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.WebhookError
LocaleResource.Value: Webhook was not created (see details in the log)

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.PaymentMethodDescription
LocaleResource.Value: Pay by PayPal, credit or debit card.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.ErrorExecutePayment
LocaleResource.Value: Error. PayPal. Can't execute PayPal payment.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.ErrorCreatedOrder
LocaleResource.Value: Error. PayPal. Can't create order. Please contact to support about this problem.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.WrongPaymentID
LocaleResource.Value: Error. Can't connect to PayPal. Wrong paymentID.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.RedirectionTip
LocaleResource.Value: You will be redirected to PayPal site to complete the order.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.Refund.EmptyCaptureTransactionId
LocaleResource.Value: Error. Can't refund online. Empty CaptureTransactionId value.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.ErrorGetPayment
LocaleResource.Value: Error. PayPal. Can't read PayPal payment detalis.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.ErrorOrderTotal
LocaleResource.Value: Error. Your order total was changed. Old amount = {0}, new amount = {1}.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalStandardPro.WrongOrderTotal
LocaleResource.Value: Error. Order total couldn't be calculated.
